prompts.prompt: Find a selection of high-quality images for the topic: {topic}. For each image, return the direct URL, photographer's name, and a short description. Show a list of at least 6 options. If possible, ensure diversity in style or content.

template.name: find-photos-for-topic
template.title: Find photos for topic
template.description: Finds and lists a diverse set of high-quality Pexels photos for a specified topic.

arguments.name: topic
arguments.description: The subject or theme to search for (e.g., 'urban skyline', 'wildlife', 'abstract').

prompts.prompt: Find trending video footage for the theme: {theme}. List at least 4 videos with their preview thumbnail, direct video URL, and the creator's name. Optionally include video length and resolution if available.

template.name: find-trending-videos
template.title: Find trending videos
template.description: Returns a set of currently trending or popular Pexels videos based on a theme.

arguments.name: theme
arguments.description: The subject, style, or mood for the videos (e.g., 'nature', 'sports', 'city timelapse').

prompts.prompt: Compare the visual styles of two search terms: '{query1}' vs. '{query2}'. Fetch 3-5 example images or videos for each, and describe the differences in mood, color palette, and composition.

template.name: compare-visual-styles
template.title: Compare visual styles
template.description: Compares two visual search queries and describes key differences with image/video examples.

arguments.name: query1
arguments.description: The first search term or concept (e.g., 'sunset beach').

arguments.name: query2
arguments.description: The second search term or concept (e.g., 'mountain sunrise').

prompts.prompt: Curate an inspiration board for the project theme: {projectTheme}. Search and combine a mix of photos and videos (at least 4 of each) that fit the mood and subject.

template.name: curate-inspiration-board
template.title: Curate inspiration board
template.description: Curates a project inspiration board with a balanced set of photos and videos fitting a given theme.

arguments.name: projectTheme
arguments.description: The overarching theme or mood for the board (e.g., 'minimalism', 'street photography', 'summer travel').

prompts.prompt: Given the mood '{mood}', suggest the best search terms and filters to use on Pexels for both photos and videos.

template.name: suggest-search-terms-for-mood
template.title: Suggest search terms for mood
template.description: Suggests effective search terms and filters for a desired mood, to maximize useful Pexels results.

arguments.name: mood
arguments.description: The desired emotional tone or atmosphere (e.g., 'serene', 'adventurous', 'romantic').
